00019 def readOrb(path,molIdx,nsaos_comp):
00020 
00021   molcoef=[]
00022   molcoef_add=[]
00023   coefs_full=[]
00024   LastLine=[]
00025 
00026 
00027   if molIdx!=1 and molIdx!=2:
00028      print "molIdx can only be 1 or 2!"
00029      sys.exit()
00030   
00031 
00032   molFile=open(path,'r')
00033   readMo='false'
00034   for line in molFile:
00035           #skip comment lines
00036           if line.find('#') == 0:
00037             continue
00038 
00039           #stop reading when $end statement is reached
00040           if '$end' in line:
00041             break
00042 
00043           #analyse mo-file header
00044           if 'scfconv' in line:
00045             cols=line.split('=')
00046             str0=cols[1].split(' ')
00047             scfconv=int(str0[0])
00048           line = line.strip()
00049 
00050           #read eigenvalue and calculate size of mo-block
00051           if 'nsaos' in line:
00052               lineCounter=1
00053               readMo='true'
00054               cols=line.split('=')
00055               nsaos=int(cols[2])
00056               str1=cols[1].split(' ')
00057               eigenvalue=[float(str1[0].replace('D','e'))]
00058               ElementsInLastLine=nsaos%4
00059               if ElementsInLastLine != 0:
00060                   NumberOfLines=(nsaos/4+1)
00061               else:
00062                   NumberOfLines=(nsaos/4)
00063               continue
00064 
00065           #read mo-coefficients    
00066           if readMo == 'true':     
00067             CoeffString=line
00068             #put the mo-coefficients into molcoef1 
00069             if lineCounter < NumberOfLines:
00070               for j in range(4):
00071                 molcoef.append(  CoeffString[0+j*20:20+j*20] )
00072               lineCounter+=1
00073             elif lineCounter == NumberOfLines and not 'nsaos' in line:
00074              #take care for non-complete lines
00075              if ElementsInLastLine != 0:
00076                for k in range(ElementsInLastLine):
00077                   molcoef.append(  CoeffString[0+k*20:20+k*20] )
00078              else:      
00079                for k in range(4):
00080                   molcoef.append(  CoeffString[0+k*20:20+k*20] )
00081 
00082              for j in range(nsaos_comp):
00083              #generate field with zeros for the other molecule
00084                 molcoef_add.append( '0.00000000000000D-00' )
00085              #now glue eigenvalue, coefficients and zeros together
00086              if molIdx == 1:
00087                 eigenvalue.extend(molcoef)            
00088                 eigenvalue.extend(molcoef_add)
00089              else:
00090                 eigenvalue.extend(molcoef_add)
00091                 eigenvalue.extend(molcoef)            
00092              #store complete mo into the mo-vector list       
00093              coefs_full.append( eigenvalue )
00094              #re-initialize for next pass
00095              molcoef=[]
00096              molcoef_add=[]
00097              eigenvalue=[]
00098              readMo='false'
00099   molFile.close()
00100 
00101   return coefs_full
00102

00105 def getOrbDim(path):
00106   """ extract "scfconv" and "nsaos" from the orbital read """
00107      
00108 
00109 
00110   molFile=open(path,'r')
00111   for line in molFile:
00112           #skip comment lines
00113           if line.find('#') == 0:
00114             continue
00115 
00116           #stop reading when $end statement is reached
00117           if '$end' in line:
00118             print "we should never come here!"
00119             break
00120 
00121           #analyse mo-file header
00122           if 'scfconv' in line:
00123             cols=line.split('=')
00124             str0=cols[1].split(' ')
00125             scfconv=int(str0[0])
00126 
00127           #read size of mo-block
00128           if 'nsaos' in line:
00129               lineCounter=1
00130               readMo='true'
00131               cols=line.split('=')
00132               nsaos=int(cols[2])
00133               break
00134 
00135   molFile.close()
00136 
00137   return scfconv,nsaos        
00138               
00139               
00140 def writeMo(scfconv,nsaos,coefs_full,name):
00141   """coefs_full is the mo vector field obtained by readOrb, name should be alpha,beta or mos"""
00142  
00143   import sys
00144    
00145   outFile=open(name,'w')
00146 
00147   
00148 
00149   if name == "alpha":
00150     outFile.write("$uhfmo_alpha    scfconv=%d   format(4d20.14)\n#generated by merge_mos.py\n#\n" % (scfconv))
00151   if name == "beta":
00152     outFile.write("$uhfmo_beta    scfconv=%d   format(4d20.14)\n#generated by merge_mos.py\n#\n" % (scfconv))
00153   if name == "mos":
00154     outFile.write("$scfmo    scfconv=%d   format(4d20.14)\n#generated by merge_mos.py\n#\n" % (scfconv))
00155 
00156   ElementsInLastLineNew=nsaos % 4
00157   for i in range(nsaos):
00158   #loop over mos
00159      outFile.write("%6d  a      eigenvalue=%19.14lfD+00   nsaos=%d\n" % (i+1,coefs_full[i][0],nsaos))
00160      for j in range(nsaos/4):
00161      #loop over lines
00162         outFile.write("%s%s%s%s\n" % (coefs_full[i][1+j*4],coefs_full[i][2+j*4],coefs_full[i][3+j*4],coefs_full[i][4+j*4]))
00163      if ElementsInLastLineNew > 0:
00164         LastLine=[]
00165         for k in range(ElementsInLastLineNew):
00166            #loop for elements in last line
00167            LastLine.append(coefs_full[i][k+1+(j+1)*4])
00168         str3=''.join(LastLine)
00169         outFile.write("%s\n" % (str3))
00170   outFile.write('$end\n')
00171   outFile.close()   
00172
